conexao

Class ConexaoSingleton

  • java.lang.Object
    • conexao.ConexaoSingleton

  • public class ConexaoSingleton
extends java.lang.Object
    Classe de Conexao que implementa o padrao de projeto criacional Singleton.
    See Also:
    Connection
